main event: A radar observation of a bright object over Peck, Michigan, with characteristics resembling a large star.
interesting points: The object was observed to have a bright appearance similar to molten metal., It was reported to have two small protrusions or extensions on each side., No exhaust trail or sound was detected during the observation., The sighting lasted approximately 20 minutes before the object disappeared at high speed., The observer was a pilot from TransCanada Airlines, who is described as very reliable.
sighted object: a bright object resembling a large star
witness description: a reliable pilot from TransCanada Airlines
